Text: Not a proper crack. Expect it not to work on x64.
I used system restore to undo the crack on my 64 bits computer: the crack may be good, I do not know, but it affected my computer as a whole, allowing unsigned drivers to be installed.

I've read the install notes on this and still can't figure out how to get this shit to work on 64bit. I anyone has had any luck doing so it would be awesome if you could leave a comment with step by step baby-level instructions.
